attributes.action: The banning of braces for straightening and correction of teeth unless completely neccessary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The only case of them being neccessary is that the person is suffering because of their teeth being out of alinement, not due to slight disalinement.
Pain is caused by the tightening of such braces. Medieval looking head braces make children look and feel like complete fools. A set of braces snapped in one person's mouth, causing the mouth to bleed excessively. The majority of people with braces have complained of pain.
